data.author: Conor McMullen

changelog.release_notes: Added new spots. Fixed Text. Added Menu Image

Added new spots in Cali, Hawaii
Resolved Issue with Stars

Added new spots
Resolved issue with forecast time

Resolved issue with reverting to default location
Resolved issue with too frequent update

Resolved issue with configuration
Added Pebble 2 Compatibility
Fixed issue with auto update of forecast

V1.4
Fixed issue with Timezones. Forecast should now be given for each spot as conditions are currently, irrespective of where you are in the world. The update time displayed with the spot name will indicate the local time at the spot. 
Added two new spots.
Version 1.3 Bug Fix with header & case where zero star forecast given

Version 1.1:
-Updated to include new example spots worldwide
-Modified header to include forecast update time

data.description:
Watch face that provides live surf information. Configurable to specific breaks with worldwide coverage. Powered by MagicSeaweed - the best source for reliable surf forecasts. If your local spot isn't there then just drop me an email and I'll do my best to try get it added. 
Don't forget to give the app a heart if you like it.

Provides:
-Wave heights & direction. 
-Wind speeds and directions. 
-MSW rating of wave quality. 

Version 1.17 Release Notes:
-Added some new spots

Version 1.16 Release Notes:
-All California spots now covered by App!
-Added some new spots in Hawaii
-Resolved issue with stars not being displayed correctly

Version 1.15 Release Notes:
-Added loads of new spots in North America
-Resolved issue with forecast time label

latest_release.release_notes: Added new spots. Fixed Text. Added Menu Image

data.title: SurfFace
